title: Fixed unit tests crashes and a WGL deadlock
body:
**Description of Change**

I wasn't able to run the unit tests in dev/update-skia dbfa12b644099e78cc4e46e226daba332f204f01

Got random crashes and deadlocks.

**Bugs Fixed**

Fixed the crashes and the deadlock I encountered.

- Related to issue #1227 

**API Changes**

No public changes, but I removed the `bool refNew = false` argument in the `GetObject` method, since it was always passed as `false`, so it felt redundant. This can of course change, but the `owns` and `refNew` arguments felt conflicting: should a reference ever be incremented if the wrapper doesn't own the object in the first place? Felt wrong.

**Behavioral Changes**

It is possible we now have memory leaks, I didn't check that...

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [x] Rebased on top of dev/update-skia at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
